Class Grades

  • java.lang.Object
    • Grades

  • public class Grades
extends Object
    This class will allow us to create a Grades object, each student will be represented by a Grades object.
    A Grades object contains a list of grades for the student, the student's name, the number of grades in the array, and the sum, average, median, maximum, and minimum of all grades.
    Author:
    Paul Szyller

      • Grades

        public Grades(String newName)
        Constructor method for the class Grades.
        Parameters:
        newName - The student's name for the new Grades object.

    • Method Detail

      • insertGrade

        public void insertGrade(int newGrade)
        This method inputs a new grade in the grades array for the student and updates all calculations for sum, avg, median, etc...
        The method also resizes the grades array if necessary to input more data.
        Parameters:
        newGrade - The grade to be added to the grades array.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        This method formats the grades array in a string to print.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

        public String getName()
        Returns:

        public int length()

        Returns:

        Returns:
        The student's median grade.

        Returns:
        The student's maximum grade.

      • minimum

        Returns:
        The student's minimum grade.
